Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web

package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web.workload
     
  • Class
    Description
    BaseDBLoadBalancer
    Implements common functionalities for DB load balancers
    BaseStatGenerator<T extends Cloudlet>
    A base class containing the main functionality of a statistical generator of CloutLets.
    BaseWebLoadBalancer
    Common functionality of load balancers.
    CompositeGenerator<T>
    A composite generator, that delegates to a list of other generators.
    CompressLoadBalancer
    A load balancer, which compresses the load into the smallest number of VMs whose utilisation is below certain thresholds.
    ConstGenerator<T>
    A generator, which generates the same value again and again.
    IDBBalancer
    Represents a matcher between DB cloudlets and DB virtual machines.
    IGenerator<T>
    This interface represents the abstraction of a queue-factory that generates a (potenentially infinite) number of instances on demand in a specific order.
    ILoadBalancer
    The load balancer of an application.
    IterableGenerator<T>
    A generator with a collection of in-memory pregenerated objects.
    IterableNumberGenerator<N extends Number>
    A number generator that uses a collection as a source for the generated numbers.
    RandomListGenerator<T>
    Generates values randomly.
    RoundRobinDBBalancer
    Implements round robin among the suitable DB servers.
    SessionFailedException
    Indicates that a session has failed.
    SimpleDBBalancer
    A simple DB balancer, that allocates a DB cloudlet to the first VM server that has the data to serve it.
    SimpleWebLoadBalancer
    Implements simple load balancing - sessions are assigned to the least busy (in terms of CPU) application server VMs.
    StatGenerator
    A statistical generator for Server cloudlets.
    WebCloudlet
    A web cloudlet is a cloudlet, which is a part of a web session.
    WebSession
    A web session is a session established between a user and an application server (deployed in a VM) and can use several database servers (deployed in separate VMs).
    WebSession.StepCloudlets
    A structure, containing the cloudlets that need to be executed for a step in the simulation.
